name: Drop The Glob
description:
Battle against your friend and try to shoot them off the map with knock back bullets, while dodging the bullets flying from the environment. For single players there is a highscore and a survival mode, try to beat my highscore of 33!

Note, please play in fullscreen to see the game properly!

How To Play:

Player 1Player 2Move = WASD
Shoot = ShiftMove = Arrowkeys
Shoot = Delete
  • Win a round by your opponent falling or by collecting 3 hearts first.
  • First to win 3 rounds wins the match!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 in a week (total of 74 hours worked on the project!)

Big thank you to these amazing assets creators:

  • Music by Legna Zeg -  The Origin, https://youtu.be/ZSb-lQMk9Nw
  • Tileset by Quintino Pixels https://quintino-pixels.itch.io/starry-night
  • Background Art by DigitalMoons.itch.io https://digitalmoons.itch.io/pixel-skies-demo
  • Character Sprites by Craftpix.net https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-pixel-art-tiny-hero-sprites/
